name: Worldbuilder - Dungeons & Dummies
description:
-Try to make the perfect world for your adventure party!

-Build the world by placing cards drawn from your deck (at the bottom of the screen) onto empty tiles. Your party and each tile has a Lvl. 

-Try to match the level of the tiles with the level of your party.

-You can check the stats of a tile by clicking the right mouse button on a tile. 

-Your party will seek for a point of interest on the map as its quest goal and will move towards it. After visiting a POI it goes on a cooldown. 

-When moving random encounters can happen that will give XP that will eventually level up your party. 

-You can also place points of interest and modifications on tiles. 

-When placing a tile onto the same type, the tile upgrades, which increases its level. 

-When moving across an empty tile, or when you dont have an active POI, your party loses drastically drive.

- If your health or your drive reaches 0, you lose.

-Gain as much fame as possible by completing quests and dont forget to buy new cards in the shop.

Controlls:

-interaction with mouse

-move camera with W,A,S,D
